Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrtd WB via Promontory Dr, South Shore Dr & 67th: EB via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette & Promontory Dr due to blockage nr 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/South Shore due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Westbound buses will operate via Promontory Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at LaSalle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at LaSalle. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/90th
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 95th, King Drive, 87th and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 95th, King Drive, 87th and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/90th.
